name: Clyp Dark Theme
description: A simple, dark theme for Clyp.
additional_info:
1.0
-Complete overhaul of theme, to be compatible with the new Clyp layout.
-Changed colours to match Google's Material Design.
-Added shadows on sound results, featured clypsters and buttons, some which change size as you hover over them

Working on making the header menus and the search box to be formatted correctly, which will be done in the next release. The popup menus for uploading and logging in/signing up will also be done as well.

--------------------

0.2
-Changed colour of text on the about page's so that it can be read more easily.
-Changed colour of several buttons to be blue instead of orange.
-Changed colour of items on the profile page.
-Changed colour of background for looking at the page for a clip.
-Some other things changed.

Comments look weird right now, I was experimenting and plan on changing them soon.

--------------------

0.1
-Majority of website styled.
-Some things such as the background behind the audio spectrum's are a bit messy looking.
-Some areas not done, such as the page for looking at a clip.
